doc.title: Audition
doc.plot: Warring spouses Carys and James are accustomed to playing their countless infidelities off against each other in a continuous battle of one-oneupmanship. But one night, when Carys finds evidence of James' latest conquest in their own bed, something snaps and a bitter battle of wits ensues. As their barbs grow ever more personal, the couple face up to what could be the final moments of their tempestuous relationship.
